body.name: COSTWAY Mesh Office Chair, Adjustable Swivel Executive Chair with Flip-up Armrest, Lumbar Support and Rocking Backrest, Ergonomic Breathable Computer Desk Chair for Home Office (Black)
features: 【Flip-up Armrest for Space-Saving】Practically equipped with flip-up armrests, this office chair allows you to fold the armrest up, performing as armless chair and save space, which is suitable for limited rooms, office, home and more. And when the armrests are put down, it cozily rests your hands and arms.

【Ergonomic & Rocking Backrest】This ergonomic desk chair features a lumbar support, which makes your waist get the proper support, reducing the stress accumulated through long-hour seating. Meanwhile, the backrest has 90-120 degrees of rocking function, which cater to each individual for comfortable seating.

【Height Adjustment & Swivel Desk Chair】 Thanks to the SGS-certified gas lift, this executive chair is able to adjust its seat height from 18”-22” to flexibly matches with most of the computer tables and studying desks for a proper seating posture. Besides, the seat can swivels at all degrees, so you can easily change the direction for conversation.

【Breathable Mesh & Cushioned Seat】The mesh backrest has strong tensile strength and guarantees breathability and heat dissipation for comfortable leaning. Padded with high-density sponge, this task chair delivers a soft seating experience. And the wide seat also provides comfort and relaxation.

【Stable Base & Silent Mobility】Compared with ordinary chair, our mid back office chair equipped with sturdier 5-claw base to increase stability and strength. It can withstand a maximum load of 330lbs. Moreover, the mute casters offer 360°rotation and free movement so that you can reach various areas in the office or home with ease.
body.description: Description Enjoy relaxed long-hour seating with our office chair! This office chair has a breathable mesh backrest for increasing airflow with good heat dissipation. The high-density sponge cushion features 3” thickness to make sure lasting plumpness and comfortable support. Also, the armrests can be flipped up for convenient storage or put down for resting arms. This swivel office chair allows you to easily change the directions. With a 90-120 degree rocking tension control, the backrest can be adjusted to the most comfortable position. 4-inch height adjustment guarantees universal compatibility with tables and desks to ensure a proper seating posture. The ergonomic back with lumbar support offers better protection to your spine and also reduces fatigue during 8-hour seating. Feature Flip-up armrests for convenient storage or put down for resting arms Seat height adjustable from 25-29 inches for different desk height 90°-120° rocking angle and variable tightness for diversified needs Back lumbar support ensures spine protection and ergonomic seating 360-degree swiveling design for better flexibility Stably supported by casters to ensure smooth mobility Breathable mesh back to promote air circulation Wide cushion with high resilience sponge to relieve thigh fatigue Easy installation with complete accessories and detailed instructions Specification Color: Black/White Material: PP, Nylon, Mesh, Sponge,Fabric, Metal Product Dimension: 25” x 25” x 36.5-40.5” (L x W x H) Seat Height: 18-22” Armrest Height: 25-29” Maximum Capacity: 330 lbs Net Weight: 21 lbs Package Includes: 1 x Office Chair 1 x Instruction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good and value
reviews.reviewText: This colour i really like when i just unpacked, the chair is very light so there is no Sound when it rolls, my daugher very much like to sit and do homework everyday!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great chair at this price range
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for working at home. It arrived quickly and the set up instructions were clear. I assembled this with the hardware provided in about ten minutes or so. I like the look of the chair (modern, clean) and so far I like the comfort of the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I saw this chair at my daughter’s apartment and loved it. It is not only very comfortable but look great.
